name: PSU Tuition Calculator
body:
![ScreenShot](http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/6751/20120408174141.jpg)

The purpose of this project is to use the data available in the pdf file "[BAO_PSU_2011_2012_FeeBook.pdf](https://github.com/matarz/PSU_tuition_calculator/blob/master/BAO_PSU_2011_2012_FeeBook.pdf)" and create a tuition calculator for all majors and levels included in the file. The original file can be obtained from PSU's website at this [link](http://www.pdx.edu/sites/www.pdx.edu.bao/files/BAO_PSU_2010_2011_FeeBook.pdf). 

The calculator was created using VB.NET and Visual Studio 2010. Most of the code is located at [~/Code/WP1/WP1/Form1.vb](https://github.com/matarz/PSU_tuition_calculator/blob/master/Code/WP1/WP1/Form1.vb).
tagline: Calculates tuition and fees as provided by Portland State University
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
